name: Amy's Place
short: Champaign LGBTQ+ bar (19+) — coming soon. Open 5pm–2am daily.
description: Amy's Place is a new LGBTQ+ bar in Champaign welcoming both the community and allies. The venue is 19+ and plans to be open from 5pm to 2am every day. Everyone is welcome in this inclusive space. As a new establishment, check their Facebook page for opening announcements and events.
notes: Coming soon. Phone: (217) 819-6102. Email: Amymyers75@gmail.com. Follow their Facebook page for updates and official opening date.

name: Anthem
short: 19+ nightclub in Champaign featuring a dance floor and late-night events.
description: Anthem is a 19+ nightclub in Champaign known for its dance floor, DJs, and energetic nightlife. It serves as a popular stop for students and locals looking for music-driven late-night events.
notes: Age policy is 19+. Check event listings for DJs and theme nights.

name: Central Illinois Friends
short: Community center and clinic services including HIV/STI testing, PrEP/PEP, counseling, and trans health navigation.
description: Central Illinois Friends supports the LGBTQI+ community, people living with HIV, and the general public through compassionate, personalized care. Services include sexual health education, HIV/STI testing, PrEP/PEP, safer sex kits, support for people living with HIV, trans health navigation, and a free counseling program for LGBTQ+ folks and their families.
address: 2112 E War Memorial Dr, Peoria, IL 61614
notes: Main line: (309) 431-5880. Also has additional locations/clinic days listed on their website.

name: Clique
short: LGBTQ+ bar and nightclub known for drag shows, dancing, and community nightlife.
description: Clique is an LGBTQ+ bar and nightclub in Springfield offering a welcoming environment, drag performances, themed nights, and a lively dance floor. It’s a popular social space for the LGBTQ+ community and allies in the Springfield area.
notes: Known for drag shows and weekend events. Check social media for schedules.

name: Club Diesel
short: High-energy downtown nightclub with DJs, dancing, and an inclusive nightlife crowd.
description: Club Diesel is a longtime downtown Peoria nightclub known for its energetic dance floor, DJs, themed nights, and late-night atmosphere. The club draws a diverse crowd and is widely regarded as a welcoming nightlife space for LGBTQ+ patrons and allies.
notes: Typically open late. Check social media for themed nights and special events.

name: Enough Stuff
short: Free thrift store and community space offering donated items to anyone in need at no cost.
description: Enough Stuff is a community-focused free thrift store in East Peoria where donated items — including clothing, household goods, books, hygiene products, and food pantry items — are given away for free to anyone who visits.
address: 422 E Washington St, Suite 100, East Peoria, IL 61611
notes: Open Tue–Sat with varying donation and shopping hours. Accepts up to one bag/box of items per donor per day.

name: Fae Rae Photography
short: Creative portrait and event photography — studio and on-location services in Peoria and Central Illinois.
description: Fae Rae Photography offers professional photography sessions for families, children, newborns, seniors, events, and more.
notes: Email: faeraephotography@yahoo.com. Studio in Chillicothe serving the greater Peoria area.

name: FemmeCare Health & Wellness Center
short: Primary + gyne care with LGBTQ+ specific services including gender-affirming hormone treatment and PrEP/sexual health.
description: FemmeCare Health & Wellness Center provides primary and gyne care with LGBTQ+ specific services.
notes: Call: (309) 300-0834. Secure texting line: (309) 250-3810. Email: support@femmecarehealth.com.

name: Kickback on Fulton
short: LGBTQ-owned neighborhood bar offering a relaxed, welcoming atmosphere downtown.
description: Kickback on Fulton is an LGBTQ-owned bar in downtown Peoria known for its laid-back environment.
notes: Good option for low-key evenings. Hours may vary by day.

name: Lit. on Fire Books
short: Independent bookstore and community hub featuring a curated selection of new and used books and a welcoming, inclusive space.
description: Lit. on Fire Books is a women-owned, disabled, and LGBTQ+-owned independent bookstore in Peoria.
notes: Owned and operated by Jess (she/they). Typically open Tue–Sat 12pm–6pm.

name: Peoria Proud
short: LGBTQIA+ advocacy organization and primary organizer of River City Pride Festival and other LGBTQ-centered events in Peoria.
description: Peoria Proud is a local LGBTQIA+ advocacy and community organization dedicated to promoting diversity, equity, and inclusion throughout the Greater Peoria area. The organization is the primary organizer of River City Pride Festival and coordinates additional LGBTQ-centered events, outreach efforts, and visibility initiatives throughout the year. Through advocacy, education, and community programming, Peoria Proud works to foster connection, representation, and belonging for LGBTQIA+ people and allies across Central Illinois.
address: 2112 E. War Memorial Dr., Box 02, Peoria, IL 61614

name: Positive Health Solutions
short: HIV/STI services, prevention (PrEP), case management, and gender-affirming intake in downtown Peoria.
description: Positive Health Solutions provides comprehensive HIV/STI testing, PrEP services, and gender-affirming intake.
address: 222 NE Monroe St, Suites 901 & 904, Peoria, IL 61602

name: Rebel Roots Hair Haus
short: Inclusive and creative hair salon offering cuts, color, styling, and personalized hair services in Peoria.
description: Rebel Roots Hair Haus is a dynamic and inclusive hair salon encouraging creativity and self-expression.
address: 5901 N Prospect Rd, Suite 107, Peoria, IL 61614

name: Sparky's Ringside Bar & Grill
short: Neighborhood bar and grill with pool tables, affordable drinks, and a laid-back vibe.
description: Sparky’s Ringside Bar & Grill is a casual neighborhood bar in Peoria.
notes: Primarily a local hangout. Hours and specials may vary.

name: The Bistro (The B)
short: Nightlife bar and dance spot with a diverse and social crowd in Bloomington.
description: The Bistro is a nightlife bar in Bloomington offering drinks, dancing, and a casual social atmosphere.
notes: Event nights and hours may vary.
